title: [CRASH]
body:
**Crash report**

Paste the complete crash log between the quotes below. Please include a few lines from the log preceding the crash report to provide some context.

```
% brew install redis
<blah blah blah>

% redis-server

NOTE: I am assuming this is a symptom of the new new on Mac, in which nothing seems to run, but worthy of note.  Thx - will try to debug...

=== REDIS BUG REPORT START: Cut & paste starting from here ===
14004:M 16 Dec 2020 03:48:42.721 # Redis 6.0.9 crashed by signal: 11, si_code: 2
14004:M 16 Dec 2020 03:48:42.721 # Crashed running the instruction at: 0x7fff203c0430
14004:M 16 Dec 2020 03:48:42.721 # Accessing address: 0x3059ea000
14004:M 16 Dec 2020 03:48:42.721 # Killed by PID: 0, UID: 0
14004:M 16 Dec 2020 03:48:42.721 # Failed assertion: <no assertion failed> (<no file>:0)

------ STACK TRACE ------

0   libsystem_platform.dylib            0x00007fff203c0430 _platform_memset$VARIANT$Rosetta + 108

4   redis-server                        0x0000000100c6a0c3 luaD_call + 97
5   ???                                 0x0000000032aaaba2 0x0 + 850045858
```

2. Steps to reproduce (if any) - brew install redis, redis-server

comments_data.body:
Duplicate of #8062
Feel free to try Redis 6.2 RC1
